fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a new project with Master Detail Template
2. Compile and access on device
3. Click on any row
4. Click back

Actual:
Nothing happens

Expected: 
To display the list again
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Templates: Master Detail view, after clicking an item back does not go back up a level
fields.environment:
iPhone 4 (5.1)
SDK: 2.0.0.v20120312140240
Studio: Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.0.201203091910

comments.body: Back button on all views are no longer functioning on device
Back button support simply isn't there to properly solve this problem. Instead, we are implementing iOS style navigation in TIMOB-7981.
